message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_FV_SOURCE
message.locale: Sharing source must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_FV_TARGET
message.locale: Sharing target must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_FV_SOURCE_TYPE
message.locale: Sharing source type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_FV_TARGET_TYPE
message.locale: Sharing target type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_FV_SOURCE_EVIDENCE_TYPE
message.locale: Sharing source evidence type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_FV_TARGET_EVIDENCE_TYPE
message.locale: Sharing target evidence type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XFV_SOURCE_TARGET_THESAME
message.locale: Sharing source and sharing target details must not be the same.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XRV_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: Sharing configuration administration record already exists for source evidence type %1c, target evidence type %2c, and sharing parties specified.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XRV_EVIDENCE_TYPE_MISSING
message.locale: At least one evidence type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XFV_NONIDENTICAL_SHARING_EVIDENCE_THESAME
message.locale: For non-identical sharing, the source evidence type and target evidence type cannot be the same.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XRV_SOURCE_EVIDENCE_BROKER_CONFIG_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: Sharing configuration administration record already exists for source system %1s, source evidence type %2s, target evidence type %3s, and sharing parties specified.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XRV_TARGET_EVIDENCE_BROKER_CONFIG_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: Sharing configuration administration record already exists for target system %1s, source evidence type %2s, target evidence type %3s, and sharing parties specified.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XRV_EVIDENCE_CONFIG_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: Sharing configuration administration record already exists for source evidence type %1s, target evidence type %2s, and sharing parties specified.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XFV_BOTH_SOURCE_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Both source and target for sharing cannot be an external system.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XRV_IDENTICAL_EVIDENCE_CONFIG_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: Sharing configuration administration record already exists for evidence type %1s and sharing parties specified.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XRV_IDENTICAL_SOURCE_EVIDENCE_BROKER_CONFIG_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: Sharing configuration administration record already exists for source system %1s, evidence type %2s and sharing parties specified.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XRV_IDENTICAL_TARGET_EVIDENCE_BROKER_CONFIG_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: Sharing configuration administration record already exists for target system %1s, evidence type %2s and sharing parties specified.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XRV_BOTH_ALL_OPTION_AND_INDIVIDUAL_EVIDENCE_TYPE_CANNOT_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Both 'All' option and individual evidence type cannot be selected together.

message.name: ERR_SHARINGADMINISTRATION_XRV_AUTO_ACTIVATE_CANNOT_BE_CHECKED_UNLESS_AUTO_ACCEPT_IS_ALSO_CHECKED
message.locale: Auto Activate cannot be checked unless Auto Accept is also checked.

message.name: INF_MESSAGE_NO
message.locale: No

message.name: INF_MESSAGE_LATEST_RECORD_ONLY
message.locale: Latest Record Only

message.name: INF_MESSAGE_LAST
message.locale: Last

message.name: ERR_SHARE_LAST_OPTION_MAY_NOT_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: A Share Last option may not be selected when Share Latest Only is selected

message.name: ERR_SHARE_LAST_AMOUNT_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: Where Share Last is selected an amount greater than zero must be specified

message.name: ERR_SHARE_LAST_OPTION_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Where Share Last is selected Share Last option must be specified
